markers.name: Nusantara
markers.desc: Colocation only, no internet exchange. Provides scalable infrastructure for both government and businesses.

markers.name: Biznet
markers.desc: Colocation only, no internet exchange. Tailored for hosting applications related to travel and tourism.

markers.name: CenterServ
markers.desc: Colocation only, no internet exchange. Specially high-speed.

markers.name: Indonesia Super Corridor
markers.desc: Colocation only, no internet exchange. Designed for cloud.

markers.name: Candikusuma
markers.desc:
- Java Bali Cable System (JBCS), RFS 2013, to Java Island
- Jalapati, RFS 2023, to Java Island

markers.name: Jimbaran
markers.desc:
- Link 2 Phase-2, RFS May 2005, to Java Island
- JAVALI, RFS December 2011, to Java Island

markers.name: Sanur
markers.desc: - Link 1 Phase-2, RFS May 2005, to Lombok Island

markers.name: Bali
markers.desc: - Barat Timur Indonesia-2 (BTI-2), RFS 2028, to connect the entire Indonesia

markers.name: Seraya
markers.desc:
- BALOK, RFS Feb 2016, to Lombok Island
- Indonesia Global Gateway (IGG) System, RFS May 2018, to connect the entire Indonesia + Singapore
